p:
Overall, participants described both liking the KCHD SSP and that it provided valuable resources to PWID. As explained by a male participant:
They didnâ€™t judge nobody for their problems and stuff like that. You know, they gave you the syringes to use, you know. They gave you alcohol. They gave you sharps containers to throw them away in. You know, they helped you in every way they could.
